Spascriptions Firming Anti Wrinkle Neck Cream

Brand: Spa Scriptions

Category: Anti Aging

Ingredients: AQUA/WATER/EAU, ETHYLHEXYL PALMITATE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, GLYCERIN, DIMETHICONE, PEG-100 STEARATE, GLYCERYL STEARATE, PHENOXYETHANOL, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA BUTTER), HYDROLYZED COLLAGEN, POLYSORBATE 80, SODIUM ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, ALLANTOIN, HYDROLYZED ELASTIN,

BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA BUTTER), HYDROLYZED COLLAGEN, POLYSORBATE 80, SODIUM ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, ALLANTOIN, HYDROLYZED ELASTIN, HYALURONIC ACID, ISOHEXADECANE, PROPYLENE GLYCOL, PENTYLENE GLYCOL, ACETYL HEXAPEPTIDE-8, OLIGOPEPTIDE-1, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
